text: Ant-Man and the Wasp is a 2018 superhero comedy movie and a sequel to 2015's Ant-Man. It was directed by Peyton Reed and written by Chris McKenna, Erik Sommers and Paul Rudd. ==Cast== *Paul Rudd as Scott Lang/Ant-Man *Evangeline Lilly as Hope van Dyne/Wasp *Michael Douglas as Hank Pym *Laurence Fishburne as Bill Foster *Michael Pe√±a as Luis *Michelle Pfeiffer as Janet van Dyne Category:2018 comedy movies Category:2010s action comedy movies Category:2010s superhero movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American superhero movies Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe movies Category:Movies set in 1987 Category:Superhero comedy movies Category:Movies set in 2018 Category:Movies directed by Peyton Reed
title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
